definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Histologically, dentigerous cysts are lined by stratified squamous nonkeratinizing epithelium.
sentences.chinese: 组织学上含齿囊肿为多层鳞状未角化上皮细胞所覆盖。

sentences.english: Hydropic degeneration and focal necrosis can be found by microscope in the dosage groups.
sentences.chinese: 病理组织学检查，光镜下可见水样变性及小块坏死灶。

sentences.english: Biopsies were obtained to exclude neoplasm and infection.
sentences.chinese: 组织学检查排除是肿瘤和感染。

sentences.english: The transplanted lung was examined histologically for concomitant lung rejection.
sentences.chinese: 为伴随物肺拒绝移种的肺组织学地被检验。

sentences.english: Histopathologically, the basic change is cell degeneration.
sentences.chinese: 病理组织学检查，基本变化是细胞变性。

sentences.english: Usual Interstitial Pneumonitis (UIP) is a histologic diagnosis.
sentences.chinese: 普通性间质性肺炎是组织学诊断。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical and pathological characteristics of choroidal metastatic carcinoma from lung carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察肺癌脉络膜转移的临床及病理组织学特征。

sentences.english: Postoperative histopathological examination confirmed 18 cases of gastric ectopic pancreas, and 2 cases of lipomas.
sentences.chinese: 病理组织学检查后确诊异位胰腺18例，脂肪瘤2例。

sentences.english: It was revealed, that the expression of ME and IDH loci was related with histogenesis of investigated organs.
sentences.chinese: 据透露，表达我和IDH基因是与组织学的研究机构。

sentences.english: The digestive system of 45 day-old abalone Haliotis discus hannai Ino is studied by histological method.
sentences.chinese: 以组织学方法研究了45日龄皱纹盘鲍的消化系统。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate histopathologic response of transitional epithelium of the bladder to benzalkonium bromide intravesical instillation.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解膀胱移行上皮对苯扎溴铵的组织学反应。

sentences.english: None showed histologic features of the presumed underlying liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 没有人出现假定为肝硬化时的组织学特征。

sentences.english: Histological Observation of Somatic Embryogenesis from Cultured Embryos of Quercus variabilis BI.
sentences.chinese: 栓皮栎体细胞胚胎发生的细胞组织学观察。

sentences.english: A marked historical change occurs at the epiphysis of the ribs of infected pigs.
sentences.chinese: 病猪肋骨骨骺处出现明显的组织学病变。

sentences.english: The diagnosis of aplastic anemia was confirmed by bone marrow smear and histology.
sentences.chinese: 骨髓涂片及组织学检查确诊为再障。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anatomical and histological features of the rat endolymphatic sac.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究大鼠内淋巴囊的解剖学与组织学特征。

definition: biopsy/abbr. to 活檢|活检[huo2 jian3]
pinyin: huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2
